folder.name: Dutch DBA Reports v0.1
folder.description: www.dutchdba.nl - SQL Developer Report Library v0.1 (Dec-2015)

display.name: Apex Users
display.description: Show all users known within the Apex environment.

folder.name: Redo & Archiving
folder.description: All kind of redo and archiving reports.

query.sql: select group# , BYTES/1024/1024 size_mb , STATUS , to_char(FIRST_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') first_time , FIRST_CHANGE#,to_char(NEXT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') next_time from gv$log order by group#
select * from gv$logfile where group# = :GROUP#

select trunc(first_time), sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'00',1,0)) "00", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'01',1,0)) "01", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'02',1,0)) "02", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'03',1,0)) "03", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'04',1,0)) "04", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'05',1,0)) "05", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'06',1,0)) "06", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'07',1,0)) "07", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'08',1,0)) "08", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'09',1,0)) "09", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'10',1,0)) "10", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'11',1,0)) "11", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'12',1,0)) "12", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'13',1,0)) "13", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'14',1,0)) "14", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'15',1,0)) "15", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'16',1,0)) "16", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'17',1,0)) "17", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'18',1,0)) "18", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'19',1,0)) "19", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'20',1,0)) "20", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'21',1,0)) "21", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'22',1,0)) "22", sum(decode(to_char(first_time,'hh24'),'23',1,0)) "23", count(to_char(first_time,'MM-DD')) Switches_per_day from v$log_history where trunc(first_time) between trunc(sysdate) - 14 and trunc(sysdate) group by trunc(first_time) order by trunc(first_time)

display.name: Switch per day
display.description: Switches per day, presented in a line grap.

query.sql: select * from (select to_char(trunc(first_time),'yyyy-mm-dd') , 'Switches' , count(*) Switches_per_day from v$log_history group by trunc(first_time) order by trunc(first_time))

display.name: Redolog switching heatmap.
display.description: Show a grid with the switching heatmap.
display.tooltip: Show a grid with the switching heatmap.

query.sql: select * From v$sql_plan_monitor where key = :key

-- What SQL Statements/Sessions are using the most TEMP on a RAC Database? SELECT u.INST_ID, s.sid sid, s.username, a.sql_id, a.plan_hash_value, ROUND(((u.blocks*p.value)/1024/1024),2) size_mb, u.tablespace, a.sql_text FROM gv$sort_usage u, gv$session s, gv$sqlarea a, gv$parameter p WHERE s.saddr = u.session_addr AND s.INST_ID =u.INST_ID AND a.address (+) = s.sql_address AND a.hash_value (+) = s.sql_hash_value AND a.INST_ID (+) = s.INST_ID AND p.name = 'db_block_size' AND p.INST_ID =u.INST_ID AND s.username != 'SYSTEM' GROUP BY u.INST_ID, s.sid, s.username, a.sql_id, a.plan_hash_value, a.sql_text, u.tablespace, ROUND(((u.blocks *p.value)/1024/1024),2) HAVING ROUND(((u.blocks *p.value)/1024/1024),2) > 10 ORDER BY ROUND(((u.blocks*p.value)/1024/1024),2) DESC;
select l1.sid blocker , ' IS BLOCKING ' as is_blocking , l2.sid blocked_one from v$lock l1, v$lock l2 where l1.block =1 and l2.request > 0 and l1.id1=l2.id1 and l1.id2=l2.id2
select * from v$session where sid = :BLOCKER
select * from v$session where sid = :BLOCKED_ONE

SELECT Status, INST_ID, TO_CHAR(SQL_EXEC_START,'HH24:MI') as STARTTime, CASE WHEN Status<>'EXECUTING' THEN TO_CHAR(SQL_EXEC_START + (ELAPSED_TIME/1000000/24/60/60),'HH24:MI') WHEN Status IS NULL THEN NULL END as SQL_EXEC_END, ROUND(ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)||'s' as Duration, (SELECT USERNAME FROM V$SESSION WHERE v$SESSION.SID=mon.SID) AS USERNAME, SID, SQL_ID, SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE as PlanHashVal, -- Sorry, this distinct is ugly but gets the job done (SELECT DISTINCT SQL_TEXT FROM V$SQL WHERE V$SQL.SQL_ID=MON.SQL_ID) AS SQL_TEXT, KEY FROM gv$sql_monitor mon WHERE username NOT IN ('SYS','SYSTEM','DBSNMP') ORDER BY SUBSTR(STATUS,1,4) DESC, SQL_EXEC_START DESC;

SELECT s.username, UPPER (s.program) program, s.SID, ROUND (BITAND (s.ownerid, 65535)) parent_session_sid, ROUND (BITAND (s.ownerid, 16711680) / 65536) parent_session_instid, rawtohex(s.saddr) SADDR, s.serial#, s.audsid, rawtohex(s.paddr) PAADR, s.user#, s.command, s.ownerid, s.taddr, s.lockwait, s.status, s.server, s.schema#, s.schemaname, s.osuser, s.process, s.machine, s.terminal, s.TYPE, rawtohex(s.sql_address) SQL_ADDRESS, s.sql_hash_value, rawtohex(s.prev_sql_addr) PREV_SQL_ADDR, s.prev_hash_value, s.module, s.module_hash, s.action, s.action_hash, s.client_info, s.fixed_table_sequence, s.row_wait_obj#, s.row_wait_file#, s.row_wait_block#, s.row_wait_row#, to_char(s.logon_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LOGON_TIME, s.last_call_et, s.pdml_enabled, s.failover_type, s.failover_method, s.failed_over, s.resource_consumer_group, s.pdml_status, s.pddl_status, s.pq_status FROM v$session s WHERE s.TYPE != 'BACKGROUND'

SELECT audsid, client_info, command, last_call_et, lockwait, TO_CHAR(logon_time, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') LOGON_TIME, machine, module, osuser, rawtohex(paddr) PADDR, process, program, schemaname, serial#, server, SID, status, terminal, TYPE, action, username, failover_method, failed_over, failover_type, pdml_enabled, pddl_status, pdml_status, pq_status, resource_consumer_group FROM v$session s WHERE SID = :SID AND ( (s.username IS NOT NULL) AND (NVL (s.osuser, 'x') <> 'SYSTEM') AND (s.TYPE <> 'BACKGROUND'))
SELECT rawtohex(ADDR), PID, SPID, USERNAME, SERIAL#, TERMINAL, PROGRAM, TRACEID, BACKGROUND, LATCHWAIT, LATCHSPIN FROM v$process WHERE (addr = :PAADR)
SELECT * FROM v$sess_io WHERE SID = :SID

select SID , SEQ# , EVENT , P1TEXT , P1 , rawtohex(P1RAW) P1RAW , P2TEXT , P2 , rawtohex(P2RAW) P2RAW , P3TEXT , P3 , rawtohex(P3RAW) P3RAW , WAIT_TIME,SECONDS_IN_WAIT , STATE from v$session_wait where sid=:SID
SELECT ROWNUM, event, total_waits, total_timeouts, time_waited, average_wait, max_wait FROM v$session_event WHERE SID = :SID
SELECT sql_text FROM v$sqltext_with_newlines WHERE hash_value = TO_NUMBER (:SQL_HASH_VALUE) ORDER BY piece
select rawtohex(SADDR) SADDR,SID,USER_NAME,rawtohex(ADDRESS) ADDRESS,HASH_VALUE,SQL_TEXT from v$open_cursor where sid = :SID
SELECT SID, owner, TYPE, OBJECT FROM v$access WHERE SID = :SID

SELECT /*+ RULE */ lk.SID, se.username, se.osuser, se.machine, DECODE (lk.TYPE, 'TX', 'Transaction', 'TM', 'DML', 'UL', 'PL/SQL User Lock', lk.TYPE ) lock_type, DECODE (lk.lmode, 0, 'None', 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive', TO_CHAR (lk.lmode) ) mode_held, DECODE (lk.request, 0, 'None', 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive', TO_CHAR (lk.request) ) mode_requested, TO_CHAR (lk.id1) lock_id1, TO_CHAR (lk.id2) lock_id2, ob.owner, ob.object_type, ob.object_name, lk.BLOCK, se.lockwait FROM v$lock lk, dba_objects ob, v$session se WHERE lk.TYPE IN ('TM', 'UL') AND lk.SID = se.SID AND lk.id1 = ob.object_id(+) AND (lk.SID = :SID)

SELECT r.segment_name, r.tablespace_name, s.SID, s.serial#, s.username, s.machine, t.status, t.cr_get, /*consistent gets*/ t.phy_io, /*physical io*/ t.used_ublk, /*Undo blocks used*/ t.noundo, /*Is a noundo transaction*/ SUBSTR (s.program, 1, 78) "COMMAND", s.username "DB User", t.start_time, s.sql_address "Address", s.sql_hash_value "Sql Hash" FROM SYS.v_$session s, SYS.v_$transaction t, SYS.dba_rollback_segs r WHERE t.addr = s.taddr AND t.xidusn = r.segment_id and s.SID = :SID ORDER BY t.start_time

select SID,SERIAL#,OPNAME,TARGET,TARGET_DESC,SOFAR,TOTALWORK,UNITS, to_char(START_TIME,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') START_TIME, to_char(LAST_UPDATE_TIME,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') LAST_UPDATE_TIME, TIME_REMAINING,ELAPSED_SECONDS,CONTEXT,MESSAGE,USERNAME, rawtohex(SQL_ADDRESS) SQL_ADDRESS,SQL_HASH_VALUE,QCSID from v$session_longops where sid=:SID

SELECT a.SID, DECODE (b.CLASS, 1, 'User', 2, 'Redo', 4, 'Enqueue', 8, 'Cache', 16, 'OS', 32, 'ParallelServer', 64, 'SQL', 128, 'Debug', 72, 'SQL & Cache', 40, 'ParallelServer & Cache' ) CLASS, b.NAME, a.VALUE FROM v$sesstat a, v$statname b WHERE (a.statistic# = b.statistic#) AND SID = :SID
select 'alter system kill session ''' || sid || ',' || serial# || ''';' from v$session where sid = :SID

set linesize 250 set pagesize 1000
column PLAN_TABLE_OUTPUT format A110
SELECT * FROM table(DBMS_XPLAN.DISPLAY_CURSOR((:SQL_ID)))

folder.name: Storage
folder.description: All kind of storage related queries.

query.sql: SELECT T.NAME , SUM(Physical_READS) Physical_READS , ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(Physical_READS)) OVER ())*100, 2) || '%' PERC_READS , SUM(Physical_WRITES) Physical_WRITES , ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(Physical_WRITES)) OVER ())*100, 2) || '%' PERC_WRITES , SUM(total) total, ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(total)) OVER ())*100, 2) || '%' PERC_TOTAL FROM (SELECT ts# , NAME , phyrds Physical_READS , phywrts Physical_WRITES , phyrds + phywrts total FROM v$datafile df , v$filestat fs WHERE df.FILE# = fs.FILE# ORDER BY phyrds DESC ) A , sys.ts$ T WHERE A.ts# = T.ts# GROUP BY T.NAME ORDER BY Physical_READS DESC

select a.tablespace_name "Tablespace" , a.bytes_alloc / 1024 / 1024 "Total size" , nvl(b.bytes_free, 0) / 1024 / 1024 "Free space" , round((nvl(b.bytes_free, 0) / a.bytes_alloc) * 100,2) "Free %" , round(100 - (nvl(b.bytes_free, 0) / a.bytes_alloc) * 100,2) "Full %" , 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:0:'||to_char(round(100 - (nvl(b.bytes_free, 0) / a.bytes_alloc) * 100,0)) "Graph" from ( select f.tablespace_name , sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc , sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a , ( select f.tablespace_name , sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name (+) union select tablespace_name , round(sum(bytes_used + bytes_free) / 1048576, 2) , round(sum(bytes_free) / 1048576,2) , round((sum(bytes_free) / sum(bytes_used + bytes_free)) * 100,2) Pct_Free , 100 - round((sum(bytes_free) / sum(bytes_used + bytes_free)) * 100,2) Pct_used , 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:00:'||to_char(100 - round((sum(bytes_free) / sum(bytes_used + bytes_free)) * 100,0) ) from sys.v_$TEMP_SPACE_HEADER group by tablespace_name ORDER by 1

SELECT T.NAME , 'Reads' , SUM(Physical_READS) Physical_READS FROM (SELECT ts# , NAME , phyrds Physical_READS FROM v$datafile df , v$filestat fs WHERE df.FILE# = fs.FILE# ORDER BY phyrds DESC ) A , sys.ts$ T WHERE A.ts# = T.ts# GROUP BY T.NAME union SELECT T.NAME , 'Writes' , SUM(Physical_WRITES) Physical_WRITES FROM (SELECT ts# , NAME , phywrts Physical_WRITES FROM v$datafile df , v$filestat fs WHERE df.FILE# = fs.FILE# ORDER BY phyrds DESC ) A , sys.ts$ T WHERE A.ts# = T.ts# GROUP BY T.NAME
select tablespace_name , block_size , status , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT from dba_tablespaces where :TBS is null or upper(tablespace_name) like upper(:TBS)
select * from dba_data_files where upper(tablespace_name) like upper(:TABLESPACE_NAME)
select * from dba_temp_files where upper(tablespace_name) like upper(:TABLESPACE_NAME)
select owner,table_name from dba_tables where upper(tablespace_name) like upper(:TABLESPACE_NAME)
select * from dba_datapump_sessions where session_type = 'DBMS_DATAPUMP' order by job_name, session_type
select * from dba_datapump_sessions where job_name = :JOB_NAME

select decode(ro.inst_id,null,'Purged','Available') details_in_mem , j.session_recid , j.session_stamp , to_char(j.start_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time , to_char(j.end_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_time , (j.output_bytes/1024/1024) output_mbytes , j.status , j.input_type , decode(to_char(j.start_time, 'd') , 1, 'Sunday' , 2, 'Monday' , 3, 'Tuesday' , 4, 'Wednesday' , 5, 'Thursday' , 6, 'Friday' , 7, 'Saturday') dow , round(j.elapsed_seconds,0) elapsed_seconds , j.time_taken_display , x.cf , x.df , x.i0 , x.i1 , x.l , ro.inst_id output_instance from V$RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS j left outer join (select d.session_recid , d.session_stamp , sum(case when d.controlfile_included = 'YES' then d.pieces else 0 end) CF , sum(case when d.controlfile_included = 'NO' and d.backup_type||d.incremental_level = 'D' then d.pieces else 0 end) DF , sum(case when d.backup_type||d.incremental_level = 'D0' then d.pieces else 0 end) I0 , sum(case when d.backup_type||d.incremental_level = 'I1' then d.pieces else 0 end) I1 , sum(case when d.backup_type = 'L' then d.pieces else 0 end) L from V$BACKUP_SET_DETAILS d join V$BACKUP_SET s on s.set_stamp = d.set_stamp and s.set_count = d.set_count where s.input_file_scan_only = 'NO' group by d.session_recid, d.session_stamp) x on x.session_recid = j.session_recid and x.session_stamp = j.session_stamp left outer join (select o.session_recid , o.session_stamp , min(inst_id) inst_id from GV$RMAN_OUTPUT o group by o.session_recid, o.session_stamp) ro on ro.session_recid = j.session_recid and ro.session_stamp = j.session_stamp where j.start_time > trunc(sysdate)- :Num_of_days order by j.start_time

select d.bs_key , d.backup_type , d.controlfile_included , d.incremental_level , d.pieces , to_char(d.start_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time , to_char(d.completion_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') completion_time , round(d.elapsed_seconds,0) elapsed_seconds , d.device_type , d.compressed , (d.output_bytes/1024/1024) output_mbytes , s.input_file_scan_only from V$BACKUP_SET_DETAILS d join V$BACKUP_SET s on s.set_stamp = d.set_stamp and s.set_count = d.set_count where session_recid = :SESSION_RECID and session_stamp = :SESSION_STAMP order by d.start_time
select output from GV$RMAN_OUTPUT where session_recid = :SESSION_RECID and session_stamp = :SESSION_STAMP order by recid

with inc0 as (select NAME , max(rset.start_time) latest_inc0 from rman.RC_BACKUP_SET rset , rman.RC_DATABASE rdat where rset.DB_KEY = rdat.DB_KEY and rset.DB_ID = rdat.DBID and rset.backup_type = 'D' and rset.incremental_level = 0 group by name) , inc1 as (select NAME , max(rset.start_time) latest_inc1 from rman.RC_BACKUP_SET rset , rman.RC_DATABASE rdat where rset.DB_KEY = rdat.DB_KEY and rset.DB_ID = rdat.DBID and rset.backup_type = 'I' and rset.incremental_level = 1 group by name) , arch as (select NAME , max(rset.start_time) latest_arch from rman.RC_BACKUP_SET rset , rman.RC_DATABASE rdat where rset.DB_KEY = rdat.DB_KEY and rset.DB_ID = rdat.DBID and rset.backup_type = 'L' group by name) select inc0.name , to_char(inc0.latest_inc0,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') latest_inc0_start , round(sysdate - inc0.latest_inc0,0) i0_days_old , to_char(inc1.latest_inc1,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') latest_inc1_start , round(sysdate - inc1.latest_inc1,0) i1_days_old , to_char(arch.latest_arch,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') latest_arch_start , round(1440 * (sysdate - arch.latest_arch),0) arch_mins_old , case when round(sysdate - inc0.latest_inc0,0) > 7 then 'Error : INC 0 too old.' when (round(sysdate - inc1.latest_inc1,0) > 7 and (round(sysdate - inc1.latest_inc1,0) > round(sysdate - inc0.latest_inc0,0))) then 'Warning : INC 1 too old, saved by inc 0.' else 'Good' end findings from inc0 , inc1 , arch where inc1.name = inc0.name and arch.name = inc0.name order by name
select * from dba_scheduler_jobs;
select * from dba_scheduler_job_log where owner = :OWNER and JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME order by log_date desc
select * from dba_scheduler_jobs where owner = :OWNER and job_name = :JOB_NAME order by 1
select * from dba_scheduler_running_jobs
SELECT name, value FROM gv$parameter WHERE name LIKE '%audit%'

select distinct(p.user_name) USER_NAME, (select count(p2.privilege) from dba_priv_audit_opts p2 where (p.user_name is null and p2.user_name is null) or p.user_name=p2.user_name) Privilege, (select count(s2.audit_option) from dba_stmt_audit_opts s2 where (p.user_name is null and s2.user_name is null) or p.user_name=s2.user_name) System, (select count(o2.object_name) from dba_obj_audit_opts o2 where p.user_name=o2.owner) Objects from dba_priv_audit_opts p, dba_stmt_audit_opts s, dba_obj_audit_opts o where p.user_name = s.user_name(+) and p.user_name = o.owner(+) union select distinct(s.user_name) USER_NAME, (select count(p2.privilege) from dba_priv_audit_opts p2 where (s.user_name is null and p2.user_name is null) or s.user_name=p2.user_name) Privilege, (select count(s2.audit_option) from dba_stmt_audit_opts s2 where (s.user_name is null and s2.user_name is null) or p.user_name=s2.user_name) System, (select count(o2.object_name) from dba_obj_audit_opts o2 where p.user_name=o2.owner) Objects from dba_priv_audit_opts p, dba_stmt_audit_opts s, dba_obj_audit_opts o where p.user_name(+) = s.user_name and s.user_name = o.owner(+) union select distinct(o.owner) USER_NAME, (select count(p2.privilege) from dba_priv_audit_opts p2 where (o.owner is null and p2.user_name is null) or o.owner=p2.user_name) Privilege, (select count(s2.audit_option) from dba_stmt_audit_opts s2 where (o.owner is null and s2.user_name is null) or p.user_name=s2.user_name) System, (select count(o2.object_name) from dba_obj_audit_opts o2 where p.user_name=o2.owner) Objects from dba_priv_audit_opts p, dba_stmt_audit_opts s, dba_obj_audit_opts o where p.user_name(+) = o.owner and p.user_name(+) = o.owner

display.name: Privilege
display.description: DBA_PRIV_AUDIT_OPTS describes current system privileges being audited across the system and by user.

query.sql: select * from dba_priv_audit_opts where (:USER_NAME is null and user_name is null) or user_name = :USER_NAME

display.name: System
display.description: DBA_STMT_AUDIT_OPTS describes current system auditing options across the system and by user.

query.sql: select * from dba_stmt_audit_opts where (:USER_NAME is null and user_name is null) or user_name = :USER_NAME

display.name: Objects
display.description: DBA_OBJ_AUDIT_OPTS describes auditing options on all objects.

query.sql: select * from dba_obj_audit_opts where owner = :USER_NAME

SELECT b.grantee, a.grantee || ' (Role)' AS granted FROM dba_sys_privs a, dba_role_privs b WHERE a.privilege = 'RESTRICTED SESSION' AND a.grantee = b.granted_role UNION SELECT b.username, 'User (Direct)' FROM dba_sys_privs a, dba_users b WHERE a.privilege = 'RESTRICTED SESSION' AND a.grantee = b.username
